*'''Talk''': Allows users with Gmail accounts to communicate with each other through instant messaging and have online conversations.

*'''Videos''': Allows the user to limit a search to videos on the internet; Use Google to find reviews and showtimes for movies playing near you.

*'''Blogs''': Blog Search allows the user to only search blogs. Results can be sorted by relevance or by date. Although it allows you to search specific blogs, this feature is currently malfunctioning.
+
*'''Blogs''': Blog Search allows the user to search blogs and RSS feeds. Results can be sorted by relevance or by date. Although it allows you to search specific blogs, this feature is currently malfunctioning.
*'''Scholar''': Allows users to search some peer-reviewed, scholarly [[Scientific_journal|journals]]
